sache.title: Sache
sache.description: A Sass package manager in the vein of npm and Bower. This looks incredibly useful for front-end work.

when-we-build.title: When We Build
when-we-build.description: This presentation from Wilson Miner that is a philosophical take on why we design things. Full of inspiration.

the-new-cloudapp.title: The New CloudApp
the-new-cloudapp.description: The new CloudApp is an impressive update to an already amazing, little file-sharing tool.

the-neon-gospel.title: The Neon Gospel
the-neon-gospel.description: This piece from Elevation Creative is simple, powerful, and moving. I love the intersection of faith and art.

blueprint.title: Blueprint
blueprint.description: I love the whimsical illustrative style of this video and how it tells a story with pen and ink and washes of watercolor.

coins.title: Coins
coins.description: This is a beautiful bitcoin application for iOS 7 that was designed by Sam Soffes in a single day. Read the story of how it was done.

be-optimistic.title: Be Optimistic
be-optimistic.description: This is probably the coolest and manliest way Iâ€™ve ever seen to open a bottle. Happy New Year!

how-a-bicycle-is-made.title: How a Bicycle is Made
how-a-bicycle-is-made.description: This gem from British Council film is fascinating. I love the clear emphasis on quality and craftsmanship, both things I try to bring to my work.
